subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea moved closer to signing the Brazilian striker Robinho after submitting a formal bid to Real Madrid. Chelsea, of the Premier League, said last week that a transfer was being delayed by Real Madrid’s inability to sign a replacement. Chelsea could have to pay up to $40 million for Robinho.
